general_advisory: Due to continuous rain in last week, farmers are advised to keep drainage channels open. Monitor for Yellow Stem Borer, Leaf folder & Incidence of BLB & Blast disease in rice crop.

advisory: Monitor the activity of YSB by making frequent visits to the field by installing Pheromone and Light Trap.
Infestation of leaf folder & stem borer will increase after the rain so apply Cartap hydrocloride @ 400g/acre or soil application of Flubendiamide 0.7G 5kg/acre recommended.
To manage Red Rot disease in Sugarcane spray (Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64%) @ 400-gram/acre.
Vegetables like tomato are prone to attack of insects and pests after moderate rainfall. To manage it, spray 1.5g streptocyclin and 20g (metalaxyl + mancozeb) WP in 10 liters of water.
To control Fruit and shoot borer in Brinjal Spray Neem based pesticide 1500ppm @600ml/acre at initial stages.
To control different viral & phytoplasma diseases in Bitter gourd, Cucumber, and Pumpkin apply 120ml Abamectin or 30g Fipronil 80 WG per acre.
To control different viral & phytoplasma diseases in Bitter gourd, Cucumber, and Pumpkin apply 120ml Abamectin or 30g Fipronil 80 WG per acre.
To control different viral & phytoplasma diseases in Bitter gourd, Cucumber, and Pumpkin apply 120ml Abamectin or 30g Fipronil 80 WG per acre.
Yellow vein mosaic virus in okra transmit through whitefly, thus spray Methyl demeton 25 EC @ 1.6ml or Thiomethoxam 25 WG @ 2gm/lt of water to manage it.
Papaya - Install Yellow Sticky trap to trap the vector (Whitefly) of Papaya Leaf Curl Virus.

Monitor the activity of the Red palm weevil and Rhinoceros beetle by placing pheromone trap. Spray Lambda cyhalothrin @1.2ml/lit of water to the nearby manure pits for killing the developing stages of Rhinoceros beetle.
